summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1142, for the improvement of Third Avenue Northwest from West Kilbourne Street to West Forty-fifth Street, certain other streets and certain parts of certain other streets therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 12909 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
